title: PowerSchool hacker pleads guilty to student data extortion scheme
summary: A 19-year-old college student from Worcester, Massachusetts, has agreed to plead guilty to a massive cyberattack on PowerSchool that extorted millions of dollars in exchange for not leaking the personal data of millions of students and teachers. [...]

title: KrebsOnSecurity Hit With Near-Record 6.3 Tbps DDoS
summary: KrebsOnSecurity last week was hit by a near record distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attack that clocked in at more than 6.3 terabits of data per second (a terabit is one trillion bits of data). The brief attack appears to have been a test run for a massive new Internet of Things (IoT) botnet cap

title: Mobile carrier Cellcom confirms cyberattack behind extended outages
summary: Wisconsin wireless provider Cellcom has confirmed that a cyberattack is responsible for the widespread service outage and disruptions that began on the evening of May 14, 2025. [...]

title: Premium WordPress 'Motors' theme vulnerable to admin takeover attacks
summary: A critical privilege escalation vulnerability has been discovered in the premium WordPress theme Motors, which allows unauthenticated attackers to hijack administrator accounts and take complete control of websites. [...]

title: VanHelsing ransomware builder leaked on hacking forum
summary: The VanHelsing ransomware-as-a-service operation published the source code for its affiliate panel, data leak blog, and Windows encryptor builder after an old developer tried to sell it on the RAMP cybercrime forum. [...]

title: SK Telecom says malware breach lasted 3 years, impacted 27 million numbers
summary: SK Telecom says that a recently disclosed cybersecurity incident in April, first occurred all the way back in 2022, ultimately exposing the USIM data of 27 million subscribers. [...]
